name: CI Workflow

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main      # Trigger on push to main branch
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - main      # Trigger on pull requests to main branch

jobs:
  build-and-test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest  # Choose the OS for the runner
    
    steps:
      # Step 1: Check out the repository code
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      # Step 2: Set up Node.js (or other environment)
      - name: Set up Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: '16'  # Specify the Node.js version to use

      # Step 3: Install dependencies
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm install  # Or any other install command

      # Step 4: Run tests
      - name: Run tests
        run: npm test  # Run your test suite here
